title: How to Enjoy Feijoas

steps.headline: Eat them fresh from the tree.
steps.description: Simply pick them and eat them by cutting the fruit in half and scooping out the flesh with a small spoon.

steps.headline: Add feijoas to cereals for breakfast.
Use the pulp to add to muffins.
Use feijoas in alcoholic preparations, such as a feijoa cocktail or feijoa infused vodka.
Add feijoa slices to fruit salad.
Make a smoothie.
steps.description: Put the soft center part of several feijoas in a blender, add milk or soymilk, maybe some sour cream, and blend. You can add whatever you like, including ice-cream, cocoa powder, raspberries, banana. Be creative and enjoy!

tyn: Knife and cutting board to slice in half

You can add whatever you like, including ice-cream, cocoa powder, raspberries, banana. Be creative and enjoy!
